about_the_game:
Welcome to Cuprum 2929: A Living Island of the Future

In a distant future, remnants of Cyprus have transformed into Cuprum 2929, an autonomous island thriving through advanced AI and sustainable innovation. Here, gigantic AI-operated screens regulate life, while robots roam freely, embodying the pinnacle of human ingenuity.

A Disorienting Awakening
You play as a young kid who, after an ordinary evening of video games with their dog Pythagora, wakes up alone on the sandy shores of Cuprum 2929. With no memory of how they arrived and their beloved dog missing, panic sets in. The only way back to Pythagora and to uncover the truth of your sudden appearance on the island is through solving a series of complex puzzles scattered across key facilities.

Explore and Solve
Each location on the island — The Arcade, The Surveillance Center, and The Aquarium (Not available in Demo) — offers unique challenges that blend environmental puzzles with narrative-driven objectives. These aren't just tests of skill; they are keys to unraveling the deeper story of the island's existence and your mysterious transportation to this tech-forward haven.

What to Expect in the Demo
The game is a third-person puzzle adventure that incorporates narrative-driven exploration with unique puzzle mechanics based on the Pythagorean theorem.
Our demo offers a taste of the full experience, allowing you to explore selected areas of Cuprum 2929 and get a feel for the gameplay. The demo includes:

  • A Small Prologue Cutscene: Get introduced to the story and setting of Cuprum 2929.
  • Sample Puzzles in The Arcade: Experience puzzles that challenge your problem-solving skills, based on the Pythagorean theorem.
  • Sample Puzzles and Stealth Missions in The Surveillance Center: Navigate through stealth challenges while uncovering more about the island.

Features Include:

  • Third-Person Puzzle Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a world where every puzzle is a step closer to finding your dog and uncovering the island's mysteries.
  • Sample puzzles in the Arcade level
  • Sample puzzles in the Surveillance building and demo stealth missions.
  • Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Engage with puzzles that blend mathematical principles, like the Pythagorean theorem, with innovative design.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: 4 hardware CPU threads - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+ or NVIDIA Kepler+ with up-to-date Vulkan drivers.

  • Sound Card: Highly recommended

short_description: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.
